Package.Name: org.opengribs.xygrib.core.win
Package.Title: XyGrib Core Application Files
Package.Description: Executable and libraries needed to run the application.

Package.Name: org.opengribs.xygrib.data
Package.Title: XyGrib Static Data
Package.Description: Data needed by XyGrib such as maps, gis info, color schemes and translations

Package.Name: org.opengribs.xygrib.maps
Package.Title: XyGrib Optional High Resolution Maps
Package.Description: Additional GSHHS maps to enable map resolutions number 4 and 5 with 200m and 100m resolutions
